snippet.title: Contagion - IndieDB IOTY Trailer
snippet.description:
Want to see more? Subscribe! ► http://bit.ly/MonochromeLLC

Warning: Some Zombie Violence and Mature Language.

With 4 days left to vote we've put together this short trailer with additional details for fans to vote Contagion for this year's Indie of the Year awards. We are up against demos, other early betas, f2p, and fully released titles. It is our hope that Contagion can hold it's own under the Released Category and that enough people are happy with their copies or are excited for our Full Release early next year.

http://www.indiedb.com/events/2013-indie-of-the-year-awards/top100#vote12566

We're asking our fans to support Contagion and vote! Would also like to than James Donaldson for his fantastic narration once again.

Vote IndieDB - http://www.indiedb.com/events/2013-indie-of-the-year-awards/top100#vote12566
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MonochromeLLC
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonochromeLLC
Steam Store: http://store.steampowered.com/app/238430/
Company Site: http://www.monochrome-games.com
Game Site: http://www.contagion-game.com
Video Editing: http://cho-media.org/
